creator: garakutatoys
descriptionHtml:
# About
This is an application that makes smartphones easily pedometer (pedometer) easily.
It is convenient for recording step counts at daily commute and commuting, and walking records.
You can also display graphs in 1 day / 1 week / 1 month and calculate calories burned.

# Feature
· By setting weight / stride, calorie calculation according to step count can be done automatically.
· Graph display in 1 day / 1 week / 1 month can be done.
· GPS logger function.
· Show GPS log in map.
· You can set your favorite illustration on the wallpaper and you can make it to your favorite photo / character clock.
· You can set the color tone from 7 themes, you can change the screen to the color tone matching the wallpaper to use.
descriptionShort: This application that makes smartphones easily pedometer (pedometer) easily.
title: Pedometer - Step Counter & Calorie calculation
